entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
